changelog: 1.7.0: SaladBind now uses proper system folders
1.7.2: Fixed the patch of 1.7.1 :), Windows machines can now find the miner again.
1.7.3: Fixed a bug caused by 1.7.2 making it work ONLY on Windows machines.
1.7.4: Updated messages to reflect file locations being changed
1.7.8.1: Forked project and updated miners again
1.7.8.2: NiceHash hostnames fixed, broken links changed/removed
1.7.9: lolMiner configuration improved, added FAQ/Troubleshooting guide, updated miners (TeamRed, lolM, XMR)
changelog.1.7.10: SaladBind is now UnstableBind, Added 2 new experimental features, RPC customisation and Debug Information.
next_changelog: Quickly start mining with last settings
Big improvements to the error handler
Checking if Salad is already running before starting the miner
